name: Astroexploratory Program
description:
Warning: Zone 4 can give motion sickness!

Created for Game a Week 6: Falling

Sometimes you just gotta listen to the gremlin brain cells that are telling you to make a really weird and stupid game about falling through cities. Of course there was a very cool and normal idea that I started with and then well.. when the cheese lighting happened, it went down hill from there (or uphill if this is ur kinda vibe). 

Ur welcome I guess.

Controls

Use mouse to look around :)

As usual! Full expectation that WEBGL will eat my shaders, vfx and lighting :')
